title: Perkisound Xmas Offer
text:
Perkisound is an integrated music and recreation centre.

WHAT TO EXPECT Come and sing/listen to some live Xmas music in the music room then enjoy the sensory room or outdoor facilities. Find the festive settings on the interactive projector. £5 per child/adult with additional needs. please note this is an event for people with Sen. Not exclusive but very limited numbers per hour; maximum of 4 children or 2 Sen adults per hour. Book via Perkisound messenger or email info@perkisound.org.
